get.summary: Gets PBIs for given repository (requires read permissions in repository)

parameters.name: nameFilter
parameters.description: Filter for name, default is empty

parameters.name: finished
parameters.description: Filter for finished PBIs, true or false

parameters.name: esimated
parameters.description: Filter for esimated PBIs, true or false

parameters.name: inSprint
parameters.description: Filters for PBIs that are in a sprint, true or false

parameters.name: onePage
parameters.description: True if want to fetch everything as one page, false/skipped otherwise

post.summary: Add PBI for given repository (requires admin permissions in repository)

get.summary: Gets one PBI from the repository (requires read permissions in repository)

put.summary: Update PBI for given repository (requires admin permissions in repository)

requestBody.description: All values (updated and not updated) of PBI

delete.summary: Delete PBI for given repository (requires admin permissions in repository)

patch.summary: Finish PBI for given repository (requires admin permissions in repository)
Estimate PBI for given repository (requires admin permissions in repository)

get.summary: Gets users for given repository (requires read permissions in repository)
Gets repositories (requires read permissions in repository)

parameters.name: nameFilter
parameters.description: Filter for name, default is empty

post.summary: Adds repository to ScrumHub (requires admin permissions in repository)

requestBody.description: Id of repository that will be added to ScrumHub

get.summary: Gets sprints for given repository (requires read permissions in repository)

parameters.name: completed
parameters.description: Filter for only completed or only not completed sprints

parameters.name: onePage
parameters.description: True if want to fetch everything as one page, false/skipped otherwise

post.summary: Add Sprint for given repository (requires admin permissions in repository)

get.summary: Gets one sprint from the repository (requires read permissions in repository)

put.summary: Update Sprint for given repository (requires admin permissions in repository)

requestBody.description: All values (updated and not updated) of sprint

put.summary: Finish sprint (requires admin permissions in repository)

parameters.name: failed
parameters.description: True if sprint failed, false (default) if it was successful

get.summary: Gets tasks for repository (requires read permissions in repository)

parameters.name: onePage
parameters.description: True if want to fetch everything as one page, false/skipped otherwise

post.summary: Adds new task in the repository (requires admin permissions in repository)

get.summary: Gets one task (requires read permissions in repository)
Gets tasks for given PBI (or uassigned) (requires read permissions in repository)

parameters.name: pbiId
parameters.description: Id of the PBI or 0 for unassigned

patch.summary: Assigns the PBI for the task (or unassigns it) (requires admin permissions in repository)

requestBody.description: Id of the PBI, 0 to unassign

patch.summary: Assigns the person for the task (requires admin permissions in repository)
Unassigns the person from the task (requires admin permissions in repository)
Starts the task by creating a branch (requires admin permissions in repository)

parameters.name: hotFix
parameters.description: Should create hotfix branch? True for hotfix, false/not present for feature

AssignPersonF.description: Login of a person to assign or unassign to the task

finished.description: Flag if the PBI was finished

expectedTimeInHours.description: Estimation how many time will be spent on PBI

timeSpentInHours.description: How many hours was spent on PBI

acceptanceCriteria.description: List of acceptance criteria for the PBI
example: Application works not slower then before changes

acceptanceCriteria.description: List of acceptance criteria for the PBI
example: Result of the game is saved as an estimate

BacklogItemPaginatedList.description: List of elements with pagination data

avatarLink.description: Link to the avatar of the person

isCurrentUser.description: True if this person is the current user

PersonPaginatedList.description: List of elements with pagination data

description.example: Agile development platform integrated with GitHub.

dateOfLastActivity.description: Date of last user activity in format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss 'UTC'" or "No recent activity"

typeOfLastActivity.description: Type of last user activity or "No recent activity"

hasAdminRights.description: Does current user have admin rights to the repository

alreadyInScrumHub.description: Is this repository already in ScrumHub

backlogItems.description: List of ids of backlog items

RepositoryPaginatedList.description: List of elements with pagination data

finished.description: Flag if the PBI was finished

pbiId.description: PBI where the task is assigned

assigness.description: People assigned to the task, "IsCurrentUser" is always false

SHTaskPaginatedList.description: List of elements with pagination data

sprintNumber.description: Number of a sprint in the project

goal.example: Sprint view consists of sprint list. Then in each element we should see all PBIs together with assigned tasks.

backlogItems.description: PBI that will be done in this sprint

isCurrent.description: True if actual sprint is current (the one with the earliest not passed finish date)

goal.example: Sprint view consists of sprint list. Then in each element we should see all PBIs together with assigned tasks.

pbIs.description: Ids of PBIs in the sprint

SprintPaginatedList.description: List of elements with pagination data

pbiId.description: Id of PBI the task belongs to, 0 for unassigned

TaskF.description: Represents information about new task from frontend
